body_content.explanation: a national park (= a large area of land protected by the government because of its natural beauty or because it has a special history) in the US state of Florida:
examples: Bring your own boat to Dry Tortugas National Park and get the most out of the opportunities to explore this remarkable national treasure.
Dry Tortugas National Park was established to preserve the rich cultural heritage of Fort Jefferson and submerged resources around the nearby keys.
